creator: HiTV Entertainment
descriptionHtml:
HiTV is your best private theater, with unlimited HD popular TV dramas, movies and entertainment programs.

Everything you want is on HiTV:

■ Unlimited entertainment & Massive content
Here are the most popular and discussed film and television content in the world, and we keep updating it. We’ve got Korean dramas, Chinese dramas, classic films, the latest blockbusters, love dramas, costume dramas, urban dramas, court dramas.

■Multilingual support
Multiple languages user interface & subtitles are available.Vietnamese, English, simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Thai, Japanese, Korean...Global language optional!

■ High definition image quality & High-speed loading
All video resources of HiTV are high-definition and high-quality, bringing you the best viewing experience!We are well applicable to all networks, which ensures fast and smooth playback without waiting for loading.

■ Downloading & Offline viewing
All our TV dramas and programs can be downloaded and watched offline, saving you traffic. You can watch them anytime and anywhere you want.

■ Save your data
HiTV records playlists and play history for you to ensure that your favorite content will not be lost. Of course, you can also delete these records.

■ Collect resources from all platforms
Bring together TV, Video, Clip, film, filmHD, PlayHD, Play, phim bộ, phim lẻ, Kho phim, Cinema, Phim Tổng Hợp, Phim HD of zing tv,fpt play,netflix,galaxy cinema,lotte cinema,cgv cinema,wetv,iqiyi.

Terms of use-
https://www.gohitv.com/documents/uagreement.html
Privacy policy-
https://www.gohitv.com/documents/ppolicy.html

*Leave your feedback and comments via chinascience2021@gmail.com.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Add multi language subtitles.Vietnamese, English, simplified Chinese and more!
2. Add trailers to see the latest contents!
3. Support the login function, and intelligently record the viewing progress after login.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Add more languages, such as Thai, Indonesian, Vietnamese, English and Simplified Chinese... Multiple language subtitles for your choice!

2. Add the function of fast forwarding or rewinding 10s during video playback.

3. Upgrade the interface. So the interface is better-looking and easier to use!
